song.verse: Pass me not, O gentle Saviour,## Hear my humble cry;## While on others Thou art calling,## Do not pass me by.
CHORUS : Saviour, Saviour,## Hear my humble cry;## While on others Thou art calling,## Do not pass me by.
Let me, at Thy throne of mercy## Find a sweet relief;## Kneeling there in deep contrition;## Help my unbelief.
Trusting only in Thy merit,## Would I seek Thy face;## Heal my wounded, broken spirit,## Save me by Thy grace.
Thou, the spring of all my comfort,## More than life to me;## Whom have I on earth beside Thee?## Whom in heavâ€™n but Thee?
